text: ཀུན་དགའ་ཡེ་ཤེས་རྒྱ་མཚོའི་གསུང་འབུམ། Works of Kunga Yeshe Gyatso 貢噶耶喜嘉措大師全集
zh-TW: 貢噶耶喜嘉措大師全集
zh-CN: 贡噶耶喜嘉措大师全集

nodes.en: theg mchog shin tu rgyas pa'i dbu ma chen po rnam par nges pa'i rnam bshad zin bris bzhugs/
tshigs bcad bcu pa'i 'grel pa zin bris su bkod pa bzhugs/
mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa mdo lugs ma'i don khol bur phyung ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa rtsa rgyud nyung ngu'i ṭī ka gsang ba kun gyi rgyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'jam dpal rdo rje 'jigs mdzad kyi man ngag rwa lo'i snyan rgyud thun mong ma yin pa bzhugs/
bsrung 'khor rdo rje brag rdzong ma'i brgyud 'debs bzhugs/
dpal rdo rje nag po chen po gur gyi mgon po lcam dral 'khor bcas kyi bsnyen thabs bzhugs/
bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i mkhan brgyud kyi gsol 'debs/
dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i bzlas dmigs nyer mkho bzhugs/
bka' babs drug ldan gyi khrid yig 'phags yul grub pa'i zhal lung bzhugs so//
